de.tub.util
Class SimilarityUtil

java.lang.Object
  de.tub.util.SimilarityUtil

public class SimilarityUtil
extends Object

This class provides methods that are used when computing the similarity of two users.

Author:
Sebastian Oelke

Constructor Detail

SimilarityUtil

public SimilarityUtil()
Method Detail

alpha

public static double alpha(int level)
Computes the parameter alpha that is based on the level of the maximal length similar sequences. Alpha is used to weight a sequence depending on the level it was found. A higher level means a higher weighting.

Alpha is computed with the following formula: 

alpha = 2^(level - 1)

Parameters:
level - the level of a maximal length similar sequence.
Returns:
the parameter alpha.

beta

public static double beta(int length)
Computes the parameter beta that is based on the length of a maximal length similar sequence. Beta is used to weight a sequence depending on its length. A longer length means a higher weighting.

Beta is computed with the following formula: 

beta = 2^(length - 1)

Parameters:
length - the length of a maximal length similar sequence.
Returns:
the parameter beta.

idfOfHgCluster

public static double idfOfHgCluster(long totalNumberOfUsers,
                                    long usersInHgCluster)
Computes the logarithm of the division of the total number of users and the number of users that visited a specific hg cluster.

Parameters:
totalNumberOfUsers - the total number of users.
usersInHgCluster - the number of users that visited a specific hg cluster.
Returns:
the inverse document frequency (IDF) value.
